title: Ping Spikes :( need a solution
body:
_**To the point: **_
      -So I've been experiencing ping spikes anywhere from 80-600 ms. It has only been happening for the past 3-4 days. Before this i would get 30-40 
      ping only.
_**What I have tried: **_
    -  I have tried running multiple scans. I ran an avast full scan, Norton full scan, and Norton Quick scan.

Some games i would get 30-40 ping for most of the game and get rare ping spikes, other times i would have a constant ping of over 300 and rarely get anything under 40.
These are the results of my internet speed test: http://www.speedtest.net/my-result/5480534679 
_I just want to climb .... :'(_
If more information is needed let me know, hopefully you can help.
Thanks in advance.

replies.body: It sounds like you could be experiencing a connection issue or packet loss through your ISP's routing.  If the steps Rineyy provided have been unsuccessful, please run a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)and attach it in a[ support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so our tech team can help you out.  Thanks for your patience, and I hope we can help get this fixed up asap!
Thank you for your help, I have ran a traceroute and attached it to the support ticket.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)


http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj


If you still experience spontaneous high pings;

Utilise Riot's [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to see what's happening with your network.
Thanks, ill give it a go then reply back to you :D

I gave it a go but didnt change much, ill try anti-malware next then see what happens.

-Anti-Malware scan said that there were no threats detected. (Malwarebytes)

So what happened is that my ping was normal for one game and then it kept spiking again the next day.
Not sure what has changed.
Follow this up with the Tech Support Specialist your ticket.
